Tab.label: Example of Dynamic Graph
select.label: dropdown selection
Request.Name: RenderTable: Four variations on a scatterplot
Title: Four variations on a scatterplot
PlotCode:
y <<-eval(parse(text=paste(input$text)))
                   dynamicData<<-data.frame(x=1:length(y), y=y) #create dataset for dynamic plot
                   dynamicData.xvar<<-"x"  #indicate the column varible for X-axis
                   dynamicData.yvar<<-"y"  #indicate the column varible for Y-axis
                   plot(y~x, data=dynamicData, type="p", xlab=input$text2 , ylab=input$text )
uilab1: 1. input R code to generate the random values
